Title: Synthesis of Chromones from 1,1-Diacylcyclopropanes: Toward the Synthesis of Bromophycoic Acid e
Abstract: © 2017 American Chemical Society.A tandem deprotection-cyclization reaction of 1,1-diacylcyclopropanes is described which allows rapid access to structurally diverse 2,3-disubstituted chromones in good yields, and with straightforward purification. The utility of this reaction is showcased by the construction of the potent antibacterial marine natural product bromophycoic acid E scaffold.
